review: I just did the pirate room at this place and it was amazing! The staff was excellent the room was set up really well and I canâ€™t wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates of the Dark Sea" by Just Escape in New York
review: Came here with my boyfriend! It was a lot of fun! We did the Pirates room and it kept me on my toes on what would happen next! Looking forward to go back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates of the Dark Sea" by Just Escape in New York
review: I've done a few escape rooms and I would say this is one of the better places. We did the pirate room and the quality of the room was great. My only issue was there didn't seem like much of a rhyme or reason connecting the clues so we felt like the game master had to hold our hand through the room. Even though we escaped, we felt like we didn't deserve it! Anyway, it was a fun time and I would probably go again.

room_title: Escape room "Pirates of the Dark Sea" by Just Escape in New York
review: I've been to many escape rooms before and have tried the Just Escape rooms twice now. I did Prey first and escaped with a little under 4 minutes. Just recently did Pirates of the Dark Sea and we escaped with less than 1 minute left. Out of all the different escape rooms I've done, Just Escape ranks pretty well among them. They have clean, well designed and high quality rooms. Both rooms I did had great props and challenging puzzles to solve. They were entertaining and managed to not be boring even for someone like me who is experienced with these. They put a lot of effort into their rooms and the themes. I definitely recommend this.

room_title: Escape room "Pirates of the Dark Sea" by Just Escape in New York
review: So I couldn't get enough of my new favorite activity to do and went back here the next day. I did the Pirates of the Dark Sea room with four of my family members. There was so much more thinking involved than in their Sweet Revenge but both were a challenge in itself. This was a pretty cool room with how it was set up. Nice little surprises to make it fun. I had Alyssa as my gamemaster and she was awesome. We didn't escape, but we'll be back to try the other four rooms for sure!
